mapper.select: select email as mail,name as name,count(*) as cnt,comno from (select mem_email as email, mem_name as name, log_data as data, com_no as comno from log_data,member where log_data.mem_no = member.mem_no) group by email,name,comno order by cnt desc
mapper.update: update company set com_pwd=#{com_pwd} where com_no=#{com_no}
mapper.select: select member.mem_no as mno, member.mem_email as memail,member.mem_name as mname,grade.gra_kind as gra,grade.gra_no as grano from member left join grade on grade.mem_no=member.mem_no where member.com_no=#{com_no}

select a.mem_no as mno,a.com_no as comno,a.mem_email as memail,a.mem_name as mname,a.mem_date as mdate, a.mem_info_no as minfono,a.mem_info_phone as mphone,a.mem_info_position as mposition,a.mem_info_dept as mdept, grade.gra_kind as gra,grade.gra_no as grano from (select member.mem_no,member.mem_email,member.mem_name,member.mem_date,member.com_no, member_info.mem_info_no,member_info.mem_info_phone,member_info.mem_info_position,member_info.mem_info_dept from member left join member_info on member.mem_no = member_info.mem_no)a left join grade on grade.mem_no = a.mem_no where a.mem_no=#{mem_no}

select member.mem_email as memail,member.mem_name as mname,a.file_name as fname,a.log_file_downdate as fdowndate,a.file_size as fsize from member, (select log_file.log_file_no,log_file.mem_no, log_file.log_file_downdate, files.file_name, files.file_size from log_file left join files on log_file.file_no = files.file_no)a where member.mem_no = a.mem_no

select pro_no as pno,pro_name as pname,pro_date as pdate,count(pro_no) as cnt from (select a.pro_no,a.pro_name,a.pro_date,a.mem_no,company_project.com_no from (select project.pro_no, project.pro_name,project.pro_date,project_user.mem_no from project left join project_user on project.pro_no=project_user.pro_no)a left join company_project on company_project.pro_no = a.pro_no)b where com_no = #{com_no} group by pro_no,pro_name,pro_date

select project_user.mem_no as mno,member.mem_email as memail,member.mem_name as mname,pro_no as pno,pro_user_man_chk as manchk from project_user left join member on project_user.mem_no = member.mem_no where pro_no=#{pro_no}
select pro_no as pno,pro_name as pname from project where pro_no=#{pro_no}
